TopicTitle: Reverse radial ullage boosters for stage separation (EDIT: never mind, found it)

Articles.Content:
I love the retrorocket module from the wobbly rockets add-on, but want a side-mounted version for larger diameter rockets. I tried using the side mounted ullage rockets from the Radial booster pack and modifying the part.cfg file to turn the models around by changing the node_attach Up Y value, but they only turn the modules around up to 90 degrees. Is there another way of rotating the model so it points up? I know I can just change the thrust vector to go upwards, but with the nozzles pointing downward it would just look weird. Is changing the DAE file the only way? Is there a free program that would allow me to do that?

Or if someone would be kind enough to do it for me, that would be awesome as well. (If I may make requests, I\'d love a rotated model of both the 'Side Mounted Ullage Rocket' from the Radial Booster Pack and the 'Vernier radial SAS unit' from the Wobbly Rockets add-on)

Of course if there is a way I can rotate them, please let me know! Thanks.
wait... It looks like there actually is a radial retro booster in the newer booster pack... it just wasnt updated on the KSP addon repository. Never mind then 8)
